OverviewPackageClassIndex

Class com.asual.enflash.utils.Time

com.asual.enflash.utils.Time

Method Index

clearTimeout(), setTimeout()

Method Detail

setTimeout

static public function setTimeout(object:Object, method:String, time:Number, arg:Object):Number
Executes a method or function after a given timeout.
Example: Time.setTimeout(Selection, "setSelection", 1000, beginIndex, endIndex);
Parameters
object - The object that contains the method that will be invoked
method - The method that will be executed
time - The timeout time in milliseconds
arg - (optional) Multiple arguments that will be passed to the method
Return
Timeout number that can be supplied to the clearTimeout() method

clearTimeout

static public function clearTimeout(timeout:Number):Void
Clears a timeout execution before it happens.
Parameters
timeout - The timeout number returned by the setTimeout() method
